meanings.definition: The quality or state of being scant or inadequate in amount
meanings.sent1: The skimpiness of the meal left everyone hungry.
meanings.sent2: She was disappointed by the skimpiness of the gift.
meanings.sent3: The skimpiness of the budget made planning the party a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The skimpiness of the fabric made the dress look cheap.
meanings.sent5: The skimpiness of the explanation left everyone confused.

meanings.definition: The act of being stingy or frugal in spending or using resources
meanings.sent1: His skimpiness with the tip annoyed the waiter.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her skimpiness when it came to buying new clothes.
meanings.sent3: His skimpiness with compliments made her feel unappreciated.
meanings.sent4: The skimpiness of his contributions to the project slowed down progress.
meanings.sent5: Her skimpiness with sharing information hindered the team's success.
